authors: Jody Phan For Daily Mail Australia
description: He's the model who previously revealed he was once overweight. And Didier Cohen proudly showed off his chiselled abs and bulging biceps as he snapped a selfie during a home workout on Friday.
title: Didier Cohen topless on Instagram after workout
title_page: Didier Cohen topless on Instagram after workout | Daily Mail Online
text:
He's the model who previously revealed he was once overweight.
And Didier Cohen proudly showed off his chiselled abs and bulging biceps as he snapped a selfie during a home workout on Friday.
The 31-year-old's latest display of fitness is a stark contrast to a photo he previously shared from his teens.
Scroll down for video
'Make do with what ya got': Male model and DJ Didier Cohen showed off his ripped torso during a workout in LA on Friday
'Make do with what ya got.. LA garage workouts.... [sic]' the former Australia's Next Top Model mentor captioned the snap.
The US-born hunk stood sideways as he posed for the selfie, while sporting a pair of workout tights and his hair in a half-ponytail.
Showing off his many tattoos as well as ripped torso, the male model stood inside what appears to be a storage area in his home.
My, how you've changed! The 31-year-old's current aesthetic is dramatically different to the one he portrayed at age 12, as shown in a throwback snap shared on Instagram last year
The male model's current aesthetic is dramatically different to the one he had in high school.
Fans were shocked when Didier shared a snap of himself attending his high school formal.
'Big boy at prom with,' he captioned the photo, which featured his sweetheart at the time, a girl named Krystle.
What a transformation! The US-born model previously admitted he was 'really overweight' and 'embarrassed' to take off his shirt when he was younger (pictured in 2011 on the left and in high school on right right)
Talking about the Instagram image, which does not resemble his current self in the slightest, the now tattooed stud confessed he was embarrassed by his larger physique.
'I was really overweight, and I was just embarrassed sometimes to take off my shirt at the beach,' he told TheFix.
The hunk said he was 19 when he finally decided to transform his physical shape.
'I started running': The former Australia's Next Top Model star revealed he began exercising and eating well at age 19 in order to transform his body
'I started running, doing a little bit of cardio, looking at what I was eating, not being super strict but just knowing what was healthier,' he told the publication.
Another image shared last August showed the hunk sporting a different haircut and much fuller face while posing for a school portrait.
The snap was later confirmed to be taken in 1997, when Didier was aged 12.
Change of lifestyle: The star admitted he wasn't 'super strict' with his diet, but was able to find healthier options as well as involving 'cardio'
Having lived in Australia for many years, Didier has carved a successful modelling and music career, and was signed to Sony Music in 2015.
Last February, the hunk announced his engagement to long-term girlfriend Jade Cara.
He revealed on Twitter: 'I get to spend the rest of my life with my best friend and soul mate.'
Engaged! Didier announced his engagement to long-term girlfriend Jade Cara last year, calling her his 'best friend and soul mate'
Jade also wrote on Instagram: 'I said yes, to being your wife and your soul mate for the rest of our lives.'
'Thank you for standing by my side in this crazy world, I love you and I can't wait to marry you.'
Didier confirmed he gave his fianc√©e a three-carat diamond ring he designed with Melbourne-based jeweller Sasha Blackwood.
